not having had any pleasant-smelling substances added to it: Even though a product is labeled "unscented," "hypoallergenic," or even "fragrance-free," it may still contain fragrances that could trigger a rash or allergic reaction. Opposite
scented
(of flowers) not having a sweet smell: The Spanish bluebell has unscented flowers borne all round the stem. Opposites
perfumed
scented
